name: KIT109 Exam Game [SAD BUT SQUARE]
description:
Click on the icons to move left and right, jump and stop. Find the correct combinations to make your way through each level, and collect the magazines to increase your lives. 

R - Reset (Costs one life to use)

Esc - Menu

1-9 (and 0): Switch Level

Features:

- All core functionality features have been implemented.

- All extra functionality features have been implemented.

- All user interface features have been implemented.

- All 10 levels with all functionality have been implemented.

-Level 9 features buttons that switch the direction of gravity.

-Level 10 features black holes that apply a centripetal force to the player.
